content: Please use this topic for discussion of Gravity SDOH Clinicalcare issues during Connectathon 26

All. We are planning to work in Use Case A for Connectathon 26. We have already created a number of tools/packages that connect the cross-platform app development toolkit (Flutter) to FHIR, as well as a demo app that harnesses SDoH resources available in FHIR. All of these are open source.

Here's a 90 sec video that explains what we've done: https://bit.ly/fhir-fli.

Here's the website for our collaborative: https://bit.ly/fhir-fli

We're happy to collaborate with any who are interested.

Re: Use Case B. Another consideration we had was to update our work to be more flexible w/ any questionnaire as loaded dynamically. Right now, the app just works with PRAPARE (LOINC 93025-5), and shifting it to work with any FHIR questionnaire is on our list of short-term objectives
The GitHub repository id will be either SDOH-Exchange-RI or Gravity-SDOH-Exchange-RI
The Gravity reference implementation GitHub repository can be found here: https://github.com/FHIR/Gravity-SDOH-Exchange-RI
